location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Nakhilu [Nokhaylo] opposite Shaik Shaab Island, to James Charles Edwards, Uncovenanted Assistant Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Berenicehaving caught fire and the pasengers (including Pelly) having taken to the boats to escape and that all persons on board and the treasure chest were saved but all other belongings lost.The letter goes on to inform Edwards that they are en-route to Bassidore and asking him to arrange for the steamer to await them there. The letter also asks that the gun-boat Clydereturn to Bassidore and to ensure that Pelly's telegram to Government is sent.
